attributes.action: recognise Henry Allingham and Harry Patch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that Henry Allingham and Harry Patch should recieve the highest honour available under the Honours system. As the oldest British survivors of the first world war and given their ages, what they have done for their country and their historical relevance I think it would be fitting for them to be knighted.  I have NO connection to the families, I just think it is right and proper.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
